name: Format\ConditionalTableColumnStyle
description: The object for applying styles to table columns that meet certain conditions.

properties.name: selectors
properties.description: An array of one or more selectors, each of which specifies one or more conditions.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The background color for the column.

properties.name: divider
properties.description: The stroke style for the divider line to the right of the column.

properties.name: minimumWidth
properties.description: The minimum width of the column as an integer in points  or in one of the available units of measure for components. See Specifying Measurements for Components.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The relative column width. This value influences the distribution of column width but does not dictate any exact values. To set an exact minimum width, use minimumWidth instead.
